fields.description:
It was noticed that `ExplodeBase.eval` returns an IterableOnce[InternalRow].  The current implementation creates a pre-allocated array, populates the array appropriately, and returns the Array.  This works as the is an implicit conversion from Array to IterableOnce.

However Allocating and populating an array does not seem to provide benefits over exposing an iterator over the input data type.

A proposed PR removes the creation and population of the array and instead returns a IterableOnce object that iterates over the underlying input.
